channel.title: What is a "vpn" and how do i stop hackers on my server?
channel.description: i have had a hacker join and we ip banned him and he came back so we didit again and hecame back is there a way to stop him alltogether

item.title: What is a "vpn" and how do i stop hackers on my server?
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

thakillah:

he used a cheat client and a vpn is a virtual private network to avoid him if you have a vps buy anti ddos and issprotection gl

you’re fucking retarded.

A VPN is basically a way to connect to a network to use its resources (even connection as a proxy)

OP: obviously figure out the characteristics of his client and check for it on login or simply ban his IP using route (IP Tables)

Read full topic
